title: Mementoes of Mai
description: "One man decides to visit his past..Ends up falling in love..And along comes the journey that will bring him to meet...Himself"The story of a man who works as an IT staff and is forced to take a leave lest it will be erased for the next year of finance.He chooses Vietnam based on a photo he glimpsed earlier on the newspaper and is soon brought into a journey of a lifetime.Thus his inner journey for love begins...
author: Helmy Kusuma
